titles.title: Tuition Account Assistance Act of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that no amount shall be includible in gross income by reason of participation in a State prepaid tuition program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/28/1995--Introduced. Tuition Account Assistance Act of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income amounts received by reason of education furnished pursuant to a qualified State prepaid tuition program (under which credits for tuition for the undergraduate education of a designated beneficiary may be purchased) or earnings on amounts paid to such a program.
